nodes.text: The Champion's Glory was a warship of the Mandalorian Clan Varad. In 3626 BBY, the starship participated in the assault on the Spirit of Vengeance II.

The Champion's Glory was a warship built by modifying the internal structure and components of a civilian vessel, to the point that the only recognizable part of the original ship was its outer hull, which had been heavily reinforced. Clan Varad optimized the ship for ship-to-ship combat, as the vessel was for use in the Great Hunt. The ship was armed with an Advanced Deployment Harpoon.
